On March 21, 2020 he signed a one-year contract to play for the Indianapolis Colts a contract worth $ 25 million. His debut game was on 13, September 2020 where they played against Jacksonville Jaguars and unfortunately lost the game.

On 20 January 2021 Rivers announced his retirement from NFL after 17 seasons and reaffirmed his plans to be the head coach of St. Michael Catholic High school Football team located in Fairhope Alabama.
